full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB MCHOD BYA TSUL LAS PHYUGS KYI GAG LHOG SEL BA'I BUM CHU SGRUB TSUL ZUR DU BKOL BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB MCHOD DANG 'BREL BA'I BUM SGRUB BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA GZHIR BYAS TE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, ,)
